text: ivarkku mump nūhinṟe janatayuṁ satyatte taḷḷippaṟaññiṭṭuṇṭ. avarkku piṟake vanna pala janapadaṅṅaḷuṁ atutanne ceytu. ōrēā janapadavuṁ taṅṅaḷuṭe daivadūtane piṭikūṭān orumpeṭṭu. asatyamupayēāgicc satyatte takarkkān avar tarkkiccukeāṇṭirunnu. atināl ñānavare piṭikūṭi. appēāḷ enṟe śikṣa etramātraṁ kaṭhinamāyirunnu
